name: Bollywood Quiz - Guess The Indian Actor & Actress
name_original: Bollywood Quiz - Guess The Indian Actor & Actress
description:
Bollywood Quiz - Guess The Indian Actor & Actress is Easy to play but Hard to master, Lots of fun, and family friendly!

Can You Guess The Indian Actor & Actress From The Photo?

Are you ready to play the hottest guessing game on the market? Test your logic and reasoning skills with Guess The Indian Actor & Actress from the Photo! Are you up for the challenge?

★ ENDLESS FUN WITH NEW PUZZLES! ★

Can you guess The Indian Actor & Actress and unlock the levels? Countless puzzles from easy to tricky are waiting for you! New puzzles are added continuously for endless word fun!

★ PURE, INSTANT FUN ★

No registration, no complicated rules. Just start playing and have fun!

★ SIMPLE AND HIGHLY ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY ★

Features:

★ Easy to play, hard to master
★ More Levels for you to solve
★ Guess The Indian Actor & Actress from the Photo!
★ Ask your friends for help when stuck!
★ High quality graphics.

Hints:

Stuck on a puzzle? Don't worry, our game provides several different hints to help you out.

★ Expose a Letter - Using this will reveal one random letter in the puzzle.

★ Remove Letters - This hint removes most of the letters from the board which are not used in the puzzle.

★ Quick Solve - This hint will completely solve the word question for you.

So what are you waiting for? Download Bollywood Quiz - Guess The Indian Actor & Actress! Now.

Free Game by Deyaa Software.
